content:
We're looking for three postdocs on Quantum Programming for three years each! Be part of a large team in Quantum Informatics, and the NQCC Quantum Software Lab. Apply here: https://elxw.fa.em3.oraclecloud.com/hcmUI/CandidateExperience/en/sites/CX_1001/job/8352
and here: https://elxw.fa.em3.oraclecloud.com/hcmUI/CandidateExperience/en/sites/CX_1001/job/8354
